summary: Retextures Dremora to make them look like Homestuck trolls.
descriptionHtml:
Let\'s face it. The trolls from Homestuck are Space Dremora. Think about it. They look like Dremora. They act like Dremora (don\'t believe me? Take a look at Varieties of Daedra some time). They use the same alphabet as the Dremora do. But they aren\'t quite the right colour to be Dremora, and that\'s where this mod comes in.

This is a small retexture for Dremora eyes, horns, and faces to make them look more like trolls. There is no .esp included, so it\'ll just replace the textures, so it will not conflict with any mods that edit the Dremora race (such as making them playable) unless that mod also changes these files. I\'d like to add face fins to Dremora Lords, but I\'m unable to model them. I may come out with a standalone troll race in the future, but there\'s no guarantees for that. Note that this will affect non-Dremora characters who use the \"demon\" eyes.

I am unaffiliated with Andrew Hussie, Homestuck, or MS Paint Adventures. This is just a fanwork.
author: Captain Lhurgoyf
